titleStmt.title: The Sclopotarie of Iosephus Quercetanus, phisition. Or His booke containing the cure of wounds receiued by shot of gunne or such like engines of warre. Whereunto is added his spagericke antidotary of medicines against the aforesayd woundes. Published into English by Iohn Hester, practitioner in the said spagiricall arte
Sclopterius
titleStmt.author: Du Chesne, Joseph, ca. 1544-1609.
Du Chesne, Joseph, ca. 1544-1609. Antidotarium spagiricum. aut
Hester, John, d. 1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Ward, for Iohn Sheldrake,

notesStmt.note: A translation by John Hester of "Sclopetarius" and "Antidotarium spagiricum".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
